name: Architecture Decision Record (ADR) Template
description: Professional template for documenting architecture decisions, evaluating options, and tracking decision rationale in software engineering projects
author: Document Writer Extension

variables.name: adrNumber
variables.placeholder: e.g., ADR-001

variables.name: title
variables.description: Clear, descriptive title of the architecture decision
variables.placeholder: e.g., Use Microservices Architecture for Order Processing System

variables.name: author
variables.placeholder: e.g., John Smith, Senior Architect

variables.name: date
variables.description: Date when the decision was made
variables.placeholder: Decision date will be formatted automatically

variables.name: status
variables.placeholder: e.g., Proposed, Accepted, Implemented, Deprecated, Superseded

variables.name: reviewDate
variables.description: Next review date for this decision
variables.placeholder: Date when this decision should be re-evaluated

variables.name: stakeholders
variables.description: Key stakeholders involved in or affected by this decision
variables.placeholder: e.g., Development Team, DevOps Team, Product Owner, Security Team

variables.name: context
variables.description: Technical and business context surrounding this decision
variables.placeholder: Background information, current situation, and factors influencing this decision

variables.name: constraints
variables.placeholder: Budget limitations, technology restrictions, time constraints, compliance requirements

variables.name: forces
variables.description: Driving forces and trade-offs that shape this decision
variables.placeholder: Performance requirements, scalability needs, maintainability, team expertise, cost considerations

variables.name: decision
variables.placeholder: Clear statement of what was decided and why this option was selected

variables.name: alternatives
variables.placeholder: Other solutions evaluated with brief description of each option

variables.name: option1Name
variables.description: Name of first option in decision matrix
variables.placeholder: e.g., Monolithic Architecture

variables.name: option1Pros
variables.placeholder: Benefits and positive aspects of this option

variables.name: option1Cons
variables.placeholder: Drawbacks and limitations of this option

variables.name: option2Name
variables.description: Name of second option in decision matrix
variables.placeholder: e.g., Microservices Architecture

variables.name: option2Pros
variables.placeholder: Benefits and positive aspects of this option

variables.name: option2Cons
variables.placeholder: Drawbacks and limitations of this option

variables.name: option3Name
variables.description: Name of third option in decision matrix (optional)
variables.placeholder: e.g., Service-Oriented Architecture

variables.name: option3Pros
variables.placeholder: Benefits and positive aspects of this option

variables.name: option3Cons
variables.placeholder: Drawbacks and limitations of this option

variables.name: positiveConsequences
variables.description: Positive outcomes and benefits from this decision
variables.placeholder: Expected improvements, benefits, and positive impacts

variables.name: negativeConsequences
variables.description: Negative outcomes and trade-offs from this decision
variables.placeholder: Risks, limitations, and potential negative impacts

variables.name: neutralConsequences
variables.description: Neutral outcomes that don't significantly impact the system
variables.placeholder: Changes that are neither clearly positive nor negative

variables.name: implementationNotes
variables.placeholder: Key steps, technical requirements, timeline, and implementation considerations

variables.name: relatedDecisions
variables.description: Related ADRs or decisions that influence or are influenced by this decision
variables.placeholder: e.g., ADR-003 Database Technology Selection, ADR-007 API Gateway Implementation

variables.name: reviewCriteria
variables.description: Criteria for reviewing and potentially revising this decision
variables.placeholder: Metrics, conditions, or events that would trigger a review of this decision

variables.name: references
variables.placeholder: Links to documentation, research papers, benchmarks, or other supporting materials

sections.name: ADR Header
sections.description: ADR number, title, date, status, and basic metadata

sections.name: Context
sections.description: Technical background, business context, constraints, and driving forces

sections.name: Decision
sections.description: The chosen solution and rationale for the decision

sections.name: Decision Matrix
sections.description: Structured comparison of alternatives with pros, cons, and scoring

sections.name: Consequences
sections.description: Positive, negative, and neutral outcomes from this decision

sections.name: Implementation Notes
sections.description: Implementation guidance, timeline, and technical considerations

sections.name: Related Decisions
sections.description: Links to other ADRs and related architectural decisions

sections.name: Review Information
sections.description: Review date, criteria, and evaluation guidelines

styling.table: bordered decision matrix with header highlighting

usageInstructions: Fill in ADR number following your team's numbering convention
Provide clear, specific title that describes the architectural decision
Document the context thoroughly - this is crucial for future understanding
List all constraints and forces that influenced the decision
Include at least 2-3 alternatives in the decision matrix for comparison
Score options on a consistent scale (recommended: 1-10)
Be honest about negative consequences and trade-offs
Include implementation timeline and key milestones
Link to related ADRs to maintain decision traceability
Set appropriate review date based on decision criticality
Update status as decision progresses through lifecycle
Keep language technical but accessible to stakeholders
